PreAdvanceDisclaimerHeader.answer: Your account will be eligible for reassessment in 15 days

PreAdvanceDisclaimerBody.answer: Kindly note that based on the above classification, some of the functionalities will not be available to you. Your account will be eligible for reassessment in 15 days. Until then, NAGA recommends you to undergo some related educational material, found under the NAGA Academy, available here to enhance your knowledge and thus allow us to unlock for you the full NAGA investment experience!

PreAdvanceHeaderVerifyBanner.answer: Congratulations, you have opened a real money account, however you have not uploaded your personal identification documents. Currently you have a deposit limit of €2,000, If you want to benefit from unlimited deposits, trading, withdrawals, please submit your identification documents.

VerifyBanner_TextContent.answer: You have an important task left! Verify your account to use all NAGA features.
